headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Triple Rewards on Deadline
content:
Deadline presents a bright vision for the future, one where competitors blow each other up using a trail of colorful light emerging from the tail end of their Shotaro. If surviving on the strength of your reflexes alone sounds daunting, thereâ€™s also power-ups strewn about to help tilt the playing field in your favor.

Whether you emerge victorious or end up reduced to a smoldering wreck, all players who participate in a round of Deadline will earn triple the usual GTA$ and RP.
